meanings.sent1: The fallen tree imbars the path through the forest.

meanings.sent3: Trying to imbar the sunlight with your hand won't work!
meanings.sent4: Her fear seemed to imbar her thoughts, preventing her from making a decision.

meanings.sent1: Heavy traffic can imbar our journey to the beach.
meanings.sent2: Don't let fear imbar your progress towards your goals.

meanings.sent4: The thick fog seemed to imbar the view of the distant mountains.
